EmailTemplate.name: 17.Security.Endpoint.Malware.T.G.E.18260.Threat Intell Report Comm 3.Email - Com
EmailTemplate.subject: Get insights about today’s biggest malware threat
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia Threat Intelligence Report 2017 Top 20 cyber threats that put your business at risk
Ransomware worms made news twice in 2017 by creating chaos in corporate networks worldwide. This year has also seen cybercriminals shift their focus further from PCs to smartphones and IoT devices.
Read the Nokia Threat Intelligence Report for statistics, insights and analysis that show how cybercriminals are using malware to target your network and customers. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
